byline: Noel King, Annie Baxter, Stan Alcorn, Aaron Schrank, Sabri Ben-Achour and David Brancaccio
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, January 28, 2015
description: Airing on Wednesday, January 28, 2015: If you want to make money, dominate a global cultural phenomenon. Apple, the iPhone company, just made a staggering amount of money. More on that. Plus, the Koch brothers’ plan to raise nearly $900 million for next year’s elections isn’t broad-based fund-raising. It will focus money from a few hundred people on state and national races. And profits on Wall Street have been falling as of late; But JP Morgan and Bank of America have found one niche market where revenue is guaranteed: Federal prisons.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, January 28, 2015
